page.title: 09Recreation ,Liskeard
page.content: Liskeard's main sporting facilities are provided at the town's Sports Centre.A swimming pool,squash and tennis courts are complemented by three major games fields.These are, however,restricted to club use.The junior school survey found that by far the most popular pastime is swimming, followed by a variety of other watersports. Liskeard,just 9 miles away from the coast and with nearby reservoirs and rivers,has ample opportunities for watersports. All facilities are organized and run by adults.Surprisingly there is a noticeable interest in boxing.Away from opportunities for sports there are a variety of clubs and societies organized for the young that include, for example,Brownies,Boys'Brigade,Tap and Ballet dancing,Fencing and Judo.
